prompts:
Hello Claude, I would like for you to read the attached blog post. @glassBead-thoughtbox-blog.md  \
\
lTake a look at the bottom where I offer a few potential paths for extending the ThoughtBox pattern. I would like for you to choose one of these to implement yourself while using this Thoughtbox server to enable very long reasoning processes and different ways of structuring your thinking. \
\
Produce a markdown specification in the specs folder describing the state of the codebase after a process has been executed to align the codebase with whatever your vision of what the codebase should be to implement the pattern you chose.
